name: addons
description: Addons securely sets your Launchpack.io env vars.

scripts.test: for f in tests/*; do echo "$f"; node "$f"; done; echo 'passed!'; exit 0

readme: # Node.js module for Launchpack.io Using this module you can dynamically download your sevice api keys from Launchpack.io ## Install Stop your node server if it is running. Run this in your terminal: ``` shell npm install addons ``` Add this to your javascript, server.js or otherwise: ``` javascript var addons = require('addons'); addons(); ``` Set environment variables and restart your server: ``` javascript ADDONS_APP_ID='app_97308f3f-948a-4f90-879a-ea3155e5f6d7' ADDONS_APP_TOKEN='pyw5WBzdfFBh5ta5K63g' node server.js ``` ## Heroku install Run this in your terminal when your Launchpack.io settings change (anytime addons.json is updated): ``` shell rake addons:heroku:push ``` Test App repo
